summary: What's going on guys? This is my fourth mod, which improves the Forsworn Bow.
descriptionHtml:
What's going on guys? This is my fourth mod, which improves the Forsworn Bow.

It increases the speed to 1.35 (from 0.8750) and increases the damage to 36 (from 12).

The improved bow's name is Bow of the Reach. It can be bought in Arnleif and Sons in Markarth.

This mod should be compatible with all mods.

Also on the Steam Workshop at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=254628332

I would really appreciate suggestions, critiques, etc. Also if it doesnâ€™t work with a mod or just doesn't work, please let me know.

If you enjoy this mod, please, leave a like. It helps get this mod noticed.

Thumbnail and screenshots taken and edited by me.
author: hmjki
